PricingPlans.title: Pricing Plans

PricingPlans.footer: All plans include high-definition, ad-free, watermark-free images with instant download; Premium plans and above support commercial use and API access.

FAQAccordion.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQAccordion.subtitle: Instructions and feature explanations about Ghiblio

questions.question: What makes Ghiblio different from other AI image generators?
questions.answer: Ghiblio is based on the powerful GPT-4 model, offering high image quality with unique Ghibli style emotions.

questions.question: What is the ChatGPT 4 model?
questions.answer: ChatGPT 4 is OpenAI's next-generation large language model with powerful image and text understanding capabilities.

questions.question: What types of images can I generate?
questions.answer: Includes portraits, pets, scenes, and more in Ghibli style, supporting text-to-image and multiple style choices.

questions.question: Do I need artistic skills?
questions.answer: No, just input text or upload photos - no design skills needed to create artwork.

questions.question: How do I write good prompts?
questions.answer: Prompts should include subject + appearance features + scene + mood, like 'Girl with straw hat running in a flower field'.

questions.question: Why is my prompt flagged as inappropriate?
questions.answer: When illegal content, portraits, or brand elements appear, the model automatically blocks them to avoid generating non-compliant content.

questions.question: Will I be charged for failed generations?
questions.answer: No, failures don't count against your quota and you can retry for free. Contact support if issues persist.

questions.question: Can I use generated images commercially?
questions.answer: Premium Plan and above include commercial licenses; images can be used for project displays or derivative works.

questions.question: Are my images safe?
questions.answer: Yes, all uploaded content is encrypted and automatically deleted after 24 hours, strictly protecting user privacy.

questions.question: How many images per plan?
questions.answer: Fresh Plan 20 times, Standard Plan 50 times, Premium Plan 150 times, Professional Plan 300 times. See pricing section for details.

Footer.slogan: Professional AI models transform photos and descriptions into dreamy artworks, bringing creators a fairy tale illustration experience.
